NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input

Output

Attributes (*)Grid list (optional output)GRIDS
Options
OutputChoiceOUTPUTAvailable Choices: [0] only z [1] all attributes Default: 0
AggregationChoiceAGGREGATIONAvailable Choices: [0] first value [1] last value [2] mean value [3] lowest z [4] highest z Default: 0
CellsizeFloating pointCELLSIZEMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 1.000000
